## Procurement Category Information

*   **Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

## Description of the Procurement

The Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) requires evidence-based psychometric assessments to select approximately 10,000 CAF members for promotions and appointments annually. The assessment tools must be suitable for leadership rank levels up to General Officers and Flag Officers. The tools will gather insight into an individual’s character, other competencies, and attributes for the purposes of selection decisions. This is a comprehensive assessment process that requires flexible access to a variety of psychometric tools measuring aspects of character and predicting leadership performance. The contract is expected to last for two (2) years with the option to extend it for up to three (3) additional one-year periods.
